casebody.data:
Wingate v. Lipsey Gas-Burner Co. et al. (Supreme Court, General Term, Second Department. May 14, 1888.)

Argued before Barnard, P. J., and Dykman, J.

Daniel S. Remsen, for appellant, E. P. Gleason Manufacturing Company. Augustus A. Levy, for respondent Wingate. Edgar J. Levy, for respondent Lipsey Gas-Burner Company.

Ho opinion. Motion granted.
